ch.epfl.lis.sde
Class TestFunction

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.lis.sde.Sde
      ch.epfl.lis.sde.TestFunction

public class TestFunction
extends Sde

Test function to test SDE solvers. dX = (-3X+1)dt + sigma*dW with X(0) = 1 (1) with the exact solution E(X) = 2/3*exp(-3t) + 1/3 (2) Ito and Stratonovich drift terms are equal since sigma is constant. We remember the Ito-Stratonovich drift conversion Fu = F - 0.5*G*G' where Fu is the drift term in Stratonovich scheme and G the diffusion term.

Author:
Thomas Schaffter (firstname.name@gmail.com)
